name: Phantom Frogger
description: In this adaptation of the classic game Frogger, hop across the gritty cityscape while avoiding a neverending barrage of humans and their automotive death machines! Achieve your ultimate form as phantom Frogger to possess humans, cars, and alligators! Use these physical forms to wreak havoc on the same streets that once imprisoned you! Phantom Frogger can’t survive long without a host so find a human to possess quickly! Possess enough people and you’ll be able to control stronger beasts such as the mighty mini van! Plow down humans for as long as you can to rack up your high score!
